nml_option.name: config_AM_eddyProductVariables_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member eddyProductVariables is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_eddyProductVariables_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_eddyProductVariables_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the eddyProductVariables analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_eddyProductVariables_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_eddyProductVariables_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: eddyProductVariablesAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the eddyProductVariables analysis member.

var.name: SSHSquared
var.description: cell-wise square of sea surface height

var.name: velocityZonalSquared
var.description: cell-wise square of component of horizontal velocity in the eastward direction

var.name: velocityMeridionalSquared
var.description: cell-wise square of component of horizontal velocity in the northward direction

var.name: velocityZonalTimesTemperature
var.description: cell-wise product of component of horizontal velocity in the eastward direction and temperature

var.name: velocityMeridionalTimesTemperature
var.description: cell-wise product of component of horizontal velocity in the northward direction and temperature
